gui
Class BoardView.Listener

java.lang.Object
  gui.BoardView.Listener
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoardListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
Enclosing class:
BoardView
protected class BoardView.Listener
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener

This class is used to catch all events happening to the BoardView, and filter them.
